context.commit_message:
üêõ Fix CLI initialization: Use template's proper init system with Python executable substitution

The CLI was using basic file copying instead of the template's sophisticated
initialization system that handles Python executable substitution in .mcp.json.

This fixes the Knowledge Manager MCP connection issue where {{PYTHON_EXECUTABLE}}
placeholders weren't being replaced with actual Python paths.

Changes:
- Updated CLI initialize_project() to use template's copy_template_files()
- Added proper Python executable detection and substitution
- Enabled manifest creation for cleanup system integration
- Maintained backward compatibility with existing installations

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
